data.text: @Yasthetwit Nevertheless I am an American taxpayer who deeply resents my government demonizing Iran & romanticizing terrorist colonial settler Israel.

@Yasthetwit Travesty. Maybe, unless you were a US soldier in 1945, who saw how the imperial Japanese fought to the death on those islands & was glad he did not have to invade Japan, as was his family?
@Yasthetwit Your profile's JFK quote was originally directed against Zionists JFK was trying to prevent having the bomb & his brother was trying to make AIPAC register under FARA.

Must-watch (this clip's a follow-up to my pinned tweet and addresses the question: To what end?):
